resources.string: Please enable the voice chat function in ChatGPT first
1. Our app relies on the official app function of chatGPT. If it is not installed, please click to install it.
2. You need to log in to your ChatGPT app, then successfully run the voice chat function in ChatGPT, and finally come back here to test the voice chat function.
3. Our app needs to be set as the default Assistant app in order to respond to system assistant shortcuts and wake words in the background.
Turning on the following wake word function, you can say
to wake ChatGPT.\n\nNote that the wake word function will run in the background to detect keywords. If you mind, please do not enable it. This function is OPTIONAL.

Our app has built-in Picovoice\'s wake word engine. If you need to use the wake word function, please go to \"https://console.picovoice.ai/signup\" to get your FREE Access Key, and then paste it into the input box below.
